oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1958-08-23 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from August 23, 1958. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Porter Wagoner (host/performer), guest performer Benny Martin with his sister JoAnn Martin, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, June Carter, and Del Wood. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 985th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Porter Wagoner; Rod Brasfield; Benny Martin; Tommy Jackson; Chet Atkins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Porter Wagoner -- Tell Her Lies And Feed Her Candy (Porter Wagoner) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Porter Wagoner) -- Porter Wagoner introduces Rod Brasfield -- Comedy routine (Rod Brasfield, Porter Wagoner) -- Porter Wagoner introduces Benny Martin -- Border Baby (Benny Martin) -- Prince Albert commercial (Porter Wagoner, Benny Martin) -- Porter Wagoner introduces Tommy Jackson -- Sally Ann (Tommy Jackson fiddle) -- Porter Wagoner talks -- Heaven's Just A Prayer Away (Porter Wagoner) -- Porter Wagoner introduces Chet Atkins -- Say "Si Si" (Chet Atkins)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Brasfield, Rod; Cash, June Carter, 1929-2003; Atkins, Chet; Wood, Del; Jackson, Tommy; Wagoner, Porter; Martin, Benny; Abell, JoAnn Martin, 1937-2012
